CPRX wow this is like a guaranteed lottery ticket that you know will hit Not buying it at these levels is beyond comprehension This is simply MMs playing games for now Jacobus is a nonissue if you ask me because 1 They cannot price their drug much under 300K due to the fact that FDA approved it for use with pediatric patients which there are a dozen of only and they owe 60M already in RD and will need another 20M or so for marketing Jacobus cannot assume that drug will be used by adults also Business decisions do not work that way 2 Physicians will not prescribe any other alternatives to Firdapse because a it does not cost but 30 per patient b convenience Firdapse contains amifampridine as the phosphate salt which is more stable than the base drug contained in Ruzurgi and therefore does not require refrigeration and c insurance cos wont take the liability of using Ruzurgi offlabel
